$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/history.title: $:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/history
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/history.text:
Full change log:  [[https://kookma.github.io/TW-Shiraz/#ChangeLog]]

* ''2.6.9'' -- 2022.10.17 -- improved Node Explorer, and task Explorer
* ''2.6.1'' -- 2022.09.27 -- new subplug Formatter, better task manager
* ''2.5.0'' -- 2022.08.02 -- new data block, updated to Tiddlywiki 5.2.3
* ''2.4.4'' -- 2021.09.19 -- added css class for tbl-expand customization
* ''2.4.2'' -- 2021.09.10 -- quick table with bunch of column formatting
* ''2.3.3'' -- 2021.05.20 -- small bug fixes in switch palette
* ''2.3.1'' -- 2021.05.19 -- tbl-linktype template to be used for generating node-explorer
* ''2.3.0'' -- 2021.05.10 -- switch palette for dim/dark and light palette selection
* ''2.2.2'' -- 2021.04.22 -- several issues fixed for pagination, notebook and image classes
* ''2.2.0'' -- 2021.02.26 -- updated to TW 5.1.23 and pagination added to dynamic tables
* ''2.1.1'' -- 2020.03.25 -- slider macro with initial status
* ''2.1.0'' -- 2020.03.23 -- stable release on TW-5.1.22pre
* ''1.0.0'' -- 2018.10.05 -- first public release

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/alerts.title: $:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/alerts
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/alerts.text:
\define alert(type:"primary" src:"", width:"100%", class:"")
$src$
\end \define alert-leftbar(type:"primary" src:"", width:"100%", class:"")
$src$
\end

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/badge.title: $:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/badge
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/badge.text: \define badge(type:"primary" src:"") $src$ \end \define badge-pill(type:"primary" src:"") $src$ \end

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/card.title: $:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/card
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/card.text:
\define card(header:"Empty", title:"Empty" subtitle:"Empty" text:"Empty",footer:"Empty", width:"100%" class:"")
<$reveal tag="div" type="nomatch" default="Empty" text=<<__header__>> >
$header$
<$reveal tag="div" type="nomatch" default="Empty" text=<<__title__>> >
$title$
<$reveal tag="div" type="nomatch" default="Empty" text=<<__subtitle__>> >
$subtitle$
<$reveal tag="div" type="nomatch" default="Empty" text=<<__text__>> >
<<__text__>>
<$reveal tag="div" type="nomatch" default="Empty" text=<<__footer__>> >
$footer$
\end

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/csvtable.title: $:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/csvtables/apps
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/csvtable.text:
\define nomenclature(id:nomenclature)
<<table-csv id:"$id$" format:"katex-inline transclude pu"  class:"table-borderless" header:no>>
\end

\define mathbox(id:"", format:"", delimiter:",")
<<table-csv id:"$id$" format:"transclude katex $format$"  class:"table-borderless table-mathbox" header:no delimiter:"""$delimiter$""">>
\end


<!-- 
- these macros uses the table-csv to display nice looking outputs
- apps means application
-->

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/csvtable.title: $:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/csvtables/formats-basic
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/csvtable.text: \define text() <$text text=<> /> \define code() <> \define transclude() <$transclude tiddler=<> field=title/>

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/csvtable.title: $:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/csvtables/formats-date
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/csvtable.text:
\define date()       <$view field=title tiddler={{{[<entry>splitregexp[\D+]!is[blank]join[]]}}} format=date template="YYYY-0MM-0DD"/>
\define shortdate()  <$view field=title tiddler={{{[<entry>splitregexp[\D+]!is[blank]join[]]}}} format=date template="mmm DDth, YYYY"/>
\define longdate()   <$view field=title tiddler={{{[<entry>splitregexp[\D+]!is[blank]join[]]}}} format=date template="DDD, MMM 0DD, YYYY"/>

<!-- these macro are used by table-csv to display entries -->

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/csvtable.title: $:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/csvtables/formats-math
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/csvtable.text: \define katex() <$latex text=<> displayMode="true"> \define katex-inline() <$latex text=<> displayMode="false"> \define pu() <$latex text={{{ [addprefix[\pu{]addsuffix[}]] }}} displayMode="false"> \define equation() <$latex text={{{ [addprefix[\begin{equation}]addsuffix[\end{equation}]] }}} displayMode="true">

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/csvtable.title: $:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/csvtables/formats-misc
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/csvtable.text: \define email() <> \define rate() <$list filter="[split[]match[*]]" variable=ignore> <$transclude tiddler="$:/core/images/star-filled" /> \end

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/csvtable.title: $:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/csvtables/formats-task
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/csvtable.text:
\define checkbox()
<!-- show done item -->
<$list filter="[<entry>trim[]match[x]]" variable=ignore><input type=checkbox checked disabled/></$list>
<!-- show task item -->
<$list filter="[<entry>trim[]match[-]]" variable=ignore><input type=checkbox disabled/></$list>
\end


\define todo-action(param)
<!-- toggle a line done (x) / undone (-) . the lbr is used to prevent replace "x, Hi" with "x, Hi Jeremy"-->
<$vars lbr="
">
  <$vars in={{{ [<row>addsuffix<lbr>] }}} out={{{[<row>splitregexp<delimiter>rest[]join[,]addprefix[$param$,]addsuffix<lbr>]}}} >
    <$action-setfield $tiddler=<<src>> text={{{ [<src>get[text]search-replace:g:<in>,<out>] }}}/>
  </$vars>
</$vars>	
\end

\define todo()
<!-- show task item -->
<$list filter="[<entry>trim[]match[-]]" variable=ignore>
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" actions=<<todo-action "x">>><input type=checkbox/></$button>
</$list>
<!-- show done item -->
<$list filter="[<entry>trim[]match[x]]" variable=ignore>
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" actions=<<todo-action "-">>><input type=checkbox checked/></$button>
</$list>

\end

<!-- these macro are used by table-csv to display entries -->

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/csvtable.title: $:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/csvtables/table-csv-utility
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/csvtable.text: \whitespace trim \define mainFilter() [subfilterbutfirst] :sort:$(sortType)$:$(sortNegate)$[split!is[blank]trim[]nth] \define tempTableSort() $:/state/tablecsv/$(currentTiddler)$/$(stateTiddler)$ \define column-header-template() <$reveal type="nomatch" stateTitle=<> stateIndex="sortIndex" text=<> tag="th"> <$button setTitle=<> setIndex="sortIndex" setTo=<> class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink" > <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index="hasnegate" $value="false"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index="negate" $value=""/> <$text text=<>/> <$reveal type="match" stateTitle=<> stateIndex="sortIndex" text=<> tag="th"> <$list filter="[getindex[hasnegate]match[false]]" variable=ignore> <$button setTitle=<> setIndex="hasnegate" setTo="true" class="tbl-sort-svg tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink" > <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index="negate" $value="reverse"/> <$text text=<>/> {{$:/core/images/down-arrow}} <$list filter="[getindex[hasnegate]match[true]]" variable=ignore> <$button setTitle=<> setIndex="hasnegate" setTo="false" class="tbl-sort-svg tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink" > <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index="negate" $value=""/> <$text text=<>/> {{$:/core/images/up-arrow}} \end

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/csvtable.title: $:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/csvtables/table-csv
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/csvtable.text:
\define table-csv(tiddler:"", delimiter:",", sortType:"alphanumeric", format:"", caption:"", class:"", header:"yes", stateTiddler:"", id:"", dclass:"dblock" ) \whitespace trim \import [[$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/csvtables/table-csv-utility]] \import [all[tiddlers+shadows]prefix[$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/csvtables/formats]] <$vars src = {{{ [<__tiddler__>is[tiddler]then<__tiddler__>else] }}} stateTiddler = {{{ [<__stateTiddler__>!is[blank]then<__stateTiddler__>else[01]] }}} > <$vars sortCol = {{{ [getindex[sortIndex]] }}} sortNegate = {{{ [getindex[negate]] }}} delimiter = {{{ [<__delimiter__>match[\t]then[°≡°]else<__delimiter__>] }}} dataBlockStartDelimiter ={{{ [<__id__>is[blank]then[@@.$dclass$]] ~[[@.$dclass$.]addsuffix<__id__>] }}} dataBlockEndDelimiter = "@@" > <$let dblock0 = {{{ [get[text]splitregexpbutfirst[1]] }}} dblock1 = {{{ [splitregexpbutlast[1]] }}} dblock = {{{ [!match[°≡°]then] :else[search-replace:g:regexp[\t],[°≡°]] }}} > <$list filter="[<__caption__>!is[blank]]" variable=ignorw> <$list filter="[<__header__>match[yes]then[1]else[0]]" variable=header_row> <$vars allRows="[splitregexp[\n]!is[blank]]"> <$list filter="[subfilterfirst]" variable=row > <$list filter="[splitregexp!is[blank]trim[]]" variable=currentColumn><> <$vars sortPos = {{{ [subfilterfirstsplitregexp!is[blank]trim[]] +[allbefore:includecount[]] }}} > <$vars sortType = {{{ [enlist:raw<__sortType__>nthelse[alphanumeric]] }}} > <$list filter=<> variable=row> <$list filter="[splitregexp!is[blank]trim[]]" variable=entry counter=pos>
$caption$
<$macrocall $name={{{ [enlist:raw<__format__>nthelse[text]] }}} />
\end

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/details.title: $:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/details
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/details.text:
\define details(label:"", src:"source", status:"", labelClass:"", srcClass:"") <$vars source = {{{ [<__src__>get[text]else<__src__>] }}} >
$label$
<>
\end

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/dtables/.title: $:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/dtables/confirm-delete
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/dtables/.text:
\define confirm-delete()
<!-- reveals deletion confirmation -->
<$list filter="[subfilter<inputFilter>limit[1]]" variable=ignore>
<$reveal class="tbl-delete-confirm" type="match" state="$:/temp/tables/delete-all!!text" text=<<currentTable>> tag="tr">
<th colspan=<<ncols>> >
<$list filter="[[$:/temp/tables/delete-all]get[confirm]match[yes]]" 
  variable=ignore emptyMessage=<<ask-for-delete>> >
  <<perform-delete>>
</$list>
</th>
</$reveal>
</$list>
\end

\define ask-for-delete()
<$set name=ntids filter="[subfilter<inputFilter>count[]]">
   Delete all <<ntids>> records?
	<$button class="tc-btn-invisible">
     <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/tables/delete-all" $field="confirm" $value="yes"/>
      {{$:/core/images/delete-button}} yes
    </$button> or 
    <$button class="tc-btn-invisible">
      <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/temp/tables/delete-all"/>
      {{$:/core/images/close-button}} no
    </$button>
</$set>				
\end

\define perform-delete()
   Warning! this action cannot be undone!
	<$button class="tc-btn-invisible">
     <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/temp/tables/delete-all"/>
     <$list filter=<<inputFilter>> variable="currentRecord">
        <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<<currentRecord>>/>
     </$list>
		 {{$:/core/images/delete-button}}  delete
    </$button> or 
    <$button class="tc-btn-invisible">
      <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/temp/tables/delete-all"/>
			{{$:/core/images/close-button}} cancel 
    </$button>
\end

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/dtables/.title: $:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/dtables/helper
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/dtables/.text:
\define columnFilter()    $(columns)$ tbl-delete

\define tempTable()       $:/state/dynamictables/$(currentTable)$

\define tempTableSort()   $(tempTable)$/sortby
\define tempTagPopup()    $(tempTable)$/$(currentRecord)$/$(currentTiddler)$
\define tempTableExpand() $(tempTable)$/expand
\define tempPathExpand()  $(tempTableExpand)$##$(currentRecord)$
\define tempTableEdit()   $(tempTable)$/edit-view-status

\define keepstate()       $:/keepstate/dynamictables/$(currentTable)$

\define tempTableFooter() $(keepstate)$/footer
\define tempTableStyle()  $(keepstate)$/style
\define tempWarningMsg()  $(keepstate)$/warning

\define pageStateTiddler()          $(keepstate)$/page-number
\define entryPerPageStateTiddler()  $(keepstate)$/entry-per-page

<!-- 
 Those tiddlers based on keepstate are permanent.
 These are tiddlers hold the data and setting for footer, styles and warning (needs to be hold).
 These state and temporary tiddlers are independent of currentTiddler (host tiddler) and on changing
 the title of host tiddler will not disconnected to table
-->

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/dtables/.title: $:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/dtables/maths
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/dtables/.text:
\define average(pn:0) <$text text={{{ [subfilter<inputFilter>$(getFieldOrIndex)$<currentColumn>average[]] }}}/>
\define median(pn:0)  <$text text={{{ [subfilter<inputFilter>$(getFieldOrIndex)$<currentColumn>median[]]  }}}/>

\define count()   <$text text={{{ [subfilter<inputFilter>$(getFieldOrIndex)$<currentColumn>count[]]     }}}/>
\define sum()     <$text text={{{ [subfilter<inputFilter>$(getFieldOrIndex)$<currentColumn>sum[]]       }}}/>
\define product() <$text text={{{ [subfilter<inputFilter>$(getFieldOrIndex)$<currentColumn>product[]]   }}}/>

\define minall() <$text text={{{ [subfilter<inputFilter>$(getFieldOrIndex)$<currentColumn>minall[]] }}}/>
\define maxall() <$text text={{{ [subfilter<inputFilter>$(getFieldOrIndex)$<currentColumn>maxall[]] }}}/>

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/dtables/.title: $:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/dtables/pagination
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/dtables/.text: \define prev-button() <$list filter="[compare:number:lt[2]then[yes]else[no]]" variable=state> <$button disabled=<> class="shiraz-dtable-page-prev tc-btn-invisible"> {{$:/core/images/chevron-left}} Prev <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field=text $subfilter="+[subtract[1]] ~[[1]]"/> \end \define next-button() <$list filter="[compare:number:gteqthen[yes]else[no]]" variable=state> <$button disabled=<> class="shiraz-dtable-page-next tc-btn-invisible"> Next {{$:/core/images/chevron-right}} <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field=text $subfilter="+[add[1]] ~[[2]]"/> \end \define limit-entries() <$select tiddler=<> default=25 actions="""<$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text=1/>"""> <$list filter='5 10 15 20 25 30 40 50' variable=num> \end

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/dtables/.title: $:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/dtables/show-edit-cell
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/dtables/.text: \define showCell() <$list filter="[]-index"> <$transclude tiddler=<> field=<> mode="inline" /> <$list filter="[]-field"> <$transclude tiddler=<> index=<> mode="inline" /> \end \define editCell() <$list filter="[]-index"> <$edit-text tiddler=<> field=<> tag="input" class="shiraz-dtable-textbox"/> <$list filter="[]-field"> <$edit-text tiddler=<> index=<> tag="input" class="shiraz-dtable-textbox"/> \end \define showCell_Locked() <> \end

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/dtables/.title: $:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/dtables/table-dynamic
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/dtables/.text:
\define table-dynamic(filter, fields:"", indexes:"", sortOp:"sort", caption:"", class:"", footerRows:"0", stateTiddler:"", editButton:"yes", pagination:"no", emptyMessage:"filter input is empty") \import [all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/Table/Macro]] <$vars inputFilter="[subfilter<__filter__>!has[draft.of]]" sortType=<<__sortOp__>> pagination=<<__pagination__>> > <$set name=currentTable value=<<__stateTiddler__>> emptyValue=<> > <$set name=fieldOrIndex filter="[<__fields__>!is[blank]]" value="field" emptyValue="index"> <> <$set name=columns filter="[]-index" value=<<__fields__>> emptyValue=<<__indexes__>> > <$list filter="[subfilterlimit[1]]" emptyMessage=<<__emptyMessage__>> variable=ignore> <$set name=sortneg tiddler=<> index="negate"> <$set name=ncols filter="[getindex[mode]match[edit]]" value={{{ [subfiltercount[]] }}} emptyValue= {{{ [subfiltercount[]subtract[1]] }}}>
> style="caption-side:top"> <> <$list filter=<> variable=currentColumn> <$set name="headerLookup" filter="[all[tiddlers+shadows]tag[$:/tags/Table/HeaderTemplate]contains:tbl-column-listlimit[1]get[title]]" value=<> emptyValue="$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/templates/header/default"> <$transclude tiddler=<> field="text" mode="inline"/> <$reveal type="gt" default=<<__footerRows__>> text="0" tag="tfoot" class="shiraz-dtable-footer"> <$list filter="[range[1,$footerRows$]addprefix[footer-]]" variable=footerRow> <$list filter=<> variable=currentColumn> <$set name="footerLookup" filter="[all[tiddlers+shadows]tag[$:/tags/Table/FooterTemplate]contains:tbl-column-listlimit[1]get[title]]" value=<> emptyValue="$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/templates/footer/default"> <$transclude tiddler=<> field="text" mode="inline"/> <$set name=tableBody filter="[]-index" value="display_body_fields" emptyValue="display_body_indexes" > <$vars total-entries={{{[subfiltercount[]] }}} page-number={{{[get[text]] ~[[1]]}}} entries-per-page={{{ [get[text]] ~[[25]] }}} > <$vars low={{{ [subtract[1]multiply] }}} high={{{[multiply] }}} > <$macrocall $name=<> /> <$reveal type="match" default=<> text="yes" tag="tr" class="shiraz-dtable-page-footer">
<$list filter="[<__editButton__>match[yes]]" variavle=ignore> <> $caption$
> style="font-weight:bold;background-color:transparent;">Numerical summary
> > <> Displaying <$text text={{{[add[1]]}}}/> through <$text text={{{ [compare:number:ltthenelse] }}}/> of <> Results | <> <>
\end

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/dtables/.title: $:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/dtables/table-utility
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/dtables/.text:
\define tableFilter_fields()   $(inputFilter)$+[$(sortneg)$$(sortType)${$(tempTableSort)$##sortIndex}]
\define tableFilter_indexes()  [enlist<items>]+[$(sortneg)$$(sortType)$[]]

\define getitems()
<$set name=Index tiddler=<<tempTableSort>> index="sortIndex">
<$list filter="[subfilter<inputFilter>!has[draft.of]]" >
<$text text="[["/>{{{ [<currentTiddler>getindex<Index>addsuffix[°≡°]] }}}<<currentTiddler>><$text text="]]"/>
</$list>
</$set>
\end

\define display_one_record()
<$wikify name="rowStyle" text="""<$transclude tiddler=<<tempTableStyle>> index=<<currentRecord>> />""" mode="inline">
<tr style=<<rowStyle>>>
<$list filter=<<columnFilter>> variable=currentColumn>
<$set name="bodyLookup" 
  filter="[all[tiddlers+shadows]tag[$:/tags/Table/BodyTemplate]contains:tbl-column-list<currentColumn>]
          +[limit[1]get[title]]"
  value=<<bodyLookup>> 
  emptyValue="$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/templates/body/default">
<$transclude tiddler=<<bodyLookup>> field="text" mode="inline"/>
</$set>
</$list>
</tr>
<!-- reveal expanded record-->
<$reveal type="match" state=<<tempPathExpand>> text="show" tag="tr">
<<display-expanded-record>>
</$reveal>
</$wikify>
\end

\define display_body_fields()  
<$set name=finalFilter filter="[<pagination>match[yes]]" value="[subfilter<tableFilter_fields>first<high>] -[subfilter<tableFilter_fields>first<low>]" emptyValue="[subfilter<tableFilter_fields>]">
<$list filter="[subfilter<finalFilter>]" variable="currentRecord">
<<display_one_record>>
</$list>
</$set>
\end

\define display_body_indexes()
<$wikify name="items" text=<<getitems>> > 
<$set name=finalFilter filter="[<pagination>match[yes]]" value="[subfilter<tableFilter_indexes>first<high>] -[subfilter<tableFilter_indexes>first<low>]" emptyValue="[subfilter<tableFilter_indexes>]">
<$list filter="[subfilter<finalFilter>]" variable="currentItem">
<$list filter="[<currentItem>split[°≡°]last[]]" variable="currentRecord">
 <<display_one_record>>
</$list>
</$list>
</$set>
</$wikify>
\end

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/dtables/.title: $:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/dtables/tbl-expand
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/dtables/.text: \define display-expanded-record() > class="shiraz-dtable-expanded-record"> <$tiddler tiddler=<> > <$list filter="[getindex[mode]match[edit]]" variable=ignore emptyMessage="""<$transclude tiddler=<> field=text mode=block/>""" > <$edit-text class="tbl-inpt-edit" tiddler=<> field="text" tag=textarea/> \end

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/dtables/.title: $:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/dtables/toggle-edit-view
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/dtables/.text:
\define toggle-edit-view()
<$reveal type="nomatch" stateTitle=<<tempTableEdit>> stateIndex="mode" text="edit">
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink" setTitle=<<tempTableEdit>> setIndex="mode" setTo="edit">{{$:/core/images/edit-button}}</$button>
</$reveal>
<$reveal type="match" stateTitle=<<tempTableEdit>> stateIndex="mode" text="edit">
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink" setTitle=<<tempTableEdit>> setIndex="mode" setTo="view">{{$:/core/images/done-button}}</$button>
</$reveal>
\end

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/dtables/.title: $:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/dtables/warning_message
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/dtables/.text:
\define show_tiddler_types()
List tiddlers with wrong type
<$list filter="[subfilter]"> <$list filter="[get[type]match[application/x-tiddler-dictionary]][get[type]match[application/json]]" variable=ignore emptyMessage="""
<$link/>
<$view field=type/>
""">
\end \define show_warning_message() Dynamic editable table from ''indexes'' expects all input tiddlers are of dataTiddler (json or dictionary) types. Using tiddlers of non //json// or //x-tiddler-dictionary// types as input can unintentionally overwrite the data in the text field of those tiddlers.

Check the tiddler types to find which tiddlers are not of dataTiddler types!
<> \end \define check_tiddlers_type_for_table_from_indexes(isEditable) <$list filter="[]-field" variable=ignore> <$list filter="[<__isEditable__>match[yes]]" variable=ignore> <$list filter="[is[missing]]" variable=ignore> <$list filter="[subfiltereach[type]get[type]]-[[application/x-tiddler-dictionary]]-[[application/json]]" variable=ignore>
Danger: Editable dynamic table from idexes with mixed types of tiddlers!   <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink" style="fill:white;" tooltip="Dismiss alert and continue with the current selection!">{{$:/core/images/close-button}} <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text="dissmiss"/>
<>
\end

\define image-card-top(img, width:"30%", align:"none", title:"Empty", text:"Empty", footer:"Empty", alt:"")

<$reveal tag="div" type="nomatch" default="Empty" text=<<__title__>> >
$title$
<$reveal tag="div" type="nomatch" default="Empty" text=<<__text__>> >
$text$
<$reveal tag="div" type="nomatch" default="Empty" text=<<__footer__>> >

$footer$

\end \define image-card-bottom(img, width:"30%", align:"none", title:"Empty", text:"Empty", footer:"Empty", alt:"")
<$reveal tag="div" type="nomatch" default="Empty" text=<<__title__>> >
$title$
<$reveal tag="div" type="nomatch" default="Empty" text=<<__text__>> >
$text$
<$reveal tag="div" type="nomatch" default="Empty" text=<<__footer__>> >

$footer$

<$image class="card-img-bottom" source=<<__img__>> alt=<<__alt__>> />
\end

\define image-card(img, width:"30%", align:"none", title:"Empty", text:"Empty", footer:"Empty", pos:"top", alt:"") \import $:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/image-card-utility <$reveal tag="div" type="match" default="top" text=<<__pos__>> > <$macrocall $name=image-card-top img=<<__img__>> title=<<__title__>> text=<<__text__>> footer=<<__footer__>> width=<<__width__>> align=<<__align__>> alt=<<__alt__>> /> <$reveal tag="div" type="nomatch" default="top" text=<<__pos__>> > <$macrocall $name=image-card-bottom img=<<__img__>> title=<<__title__>> text=<<__text__>> footer=<<__footer__>> width=<<__width__>> align=<<__align__>> alt=<<__alt__>> /> \end \define image-card-top(img, width:"30%", align:"none", title:"Empty", text:"Empty", footer:"Empty", alt:"")
<$image class="card-img-top" source=<<__img__>> alt=<<__alt__>> />
<$reveal tag="div" type="nomatch" default="Empty" text=<<__title__>> >
$title$
<$reveal tag="div" type="nomatch" default="Empty" text=<<__text__>> >
$text$
<$reveal tag="div" type="nomatch" default="Empty" text=<<__footer__>> >

$footer$

\end \define image-card-bottom(img, width:"30%", align:"none", title:"Empty", text:"Empty", footer:"Empty", alt:"")
<$reveal tag="div" type="nomatch" default="Empty" text=<<__title__>> >
$title$
<$reveal tag="div" type="nomatch" default="Empty" text=<<__text__>> >
$text$
<$reveal tag="div" type="nomatch" default="Empty" text=<<__footer__>> >

$footer$

<$image class="card-img-bottom" source=<<__img__>> alt=<<__alt__>> />
\end

$caption$

<$image class="image-overlay-content-image" source=<<__img__>> alt=<<__alt__>>/> <$set name="fdcls" filter="$fadein$ +[splitbefore[ ]] +[addprefix[image-overlay-fadeIn-]]">
> >

$title$

$text$

\end

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/list-sea.title: $:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/list-search
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/list-sea.author: Jeremy Ruston
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/list-sea.description: creates few paragraphs of dumy text
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/list-sea.text:
\define list-search( filter:"[!is[system]]", search:"search:title", template:"$:/core/ui/ListItemTemplate", class:"my-3", stateTiddler:"", placeholder:"keywords") <$set name="state" filter="[[$:/temp/list-search]addsuffix[/$stateTiddler$]addsuffix]">
> > <$keyboard key="escape" actions='<$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/>' > <$edit-text tiddler=<> type="search" tag="input" default="" placeholder="$placeholder$" class="w-100"/>
<$reveal stateTitle=<> stateField=text type="match" text="" class=<<__class__>> tag=div> <$list filter="$filter$" template=<<__template__>>/> <$reveal stateTitle=<> stateField=text type="nomatch" text="" class=<<__class__>> tag=div> <$set name=term tiddler=<> field="text"> <$list filter="$filter$+[$search$]" template=<<__template__>>/> \end

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/slider.title: $:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/slider
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/slider.text:
\define slider(label, src, labelClass, srcClass, status:"closed") <$vars revealState = """$:/state/shiraz/slider-macro/$(currentTiddler)$/$label$""" source = {{{ [<__src__>get[text]else<__src__>] }}} >

<$reveal type="nomatch" state=<> text="open" default="$status$"> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink" set=<> setTo="open"> <$transclude tiddler="$:/core/images/right-arrow" /> <$reveal type="match" state=<> text="open" default="$status$"> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink" set=<> setTo="closed"> <$transclude tiddler="$:/core/images/down-arrow" /> $label$

<$reveal type="match" state=<> text="open" default="$status$" class="$srcClass$" tag=div> <> \end

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/text-uti.text: \define tc(src:"", color:"red") $src$ \define bc(src:"", color:"yellow") $src$ \define mono(src:"", class:"") $src$ \define transform(case:"", src:"", class:"") $src$ \define hl(src:"", color:"yellow") $src$ \define hls(src:"", color:"yellow") $src$ \define hlp(src:"", color:"yellow") $src$

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/readme.title: $:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/readme
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/readme.text:
; Shiraz
Shiraz is a small framework of stylesheets, templates and macros to create stylish contents in Tiddlywiki.  Shiraz has customized elements like alerts, cards, panels, images, static tables, dynamic tables, quick table, badges, texts, etc. Shiraz uses some modified CSS classes from [[Bootstrap|https://getbootstrap.com/]] 4.3.1.

;Code and demo
For learning plugin features, syntax, tutorial and examples see the plugin demo and code pages

* Demo: https://kookma.github.io/TW-Shiraz/
* Code: https://github.com/kookma/TW-Shiraz

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/templates/body/.title: $:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/templates/body/color
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/templates/body/.text:
\define showCell()
<style>
.dt:not(:disabled):dt(.disabled) {cursor: pointer;}
a.dt.disabled,fieldset:disabled a.dt {pointer-events: none;}
</style>
<$link overrideClass="dt disabled" to="">
<$edit-text tag=input type=color tiddler=<<currentRecord>> field=color/>
</$link>
\end

\define edit_color() <$edit-text tag=input type=color tiddler=<<currentRecord>> field=<<currentColumn>>/>
<$reveal type="nomatch" stateTitle=<<tempTableEdit>> stateIndex="mode" text="edit" tag="td">
<<showCell>>
</$reveal>
<$reveal type="match" stateTitle=<<tempTableEdit>> stateIndex="mode" text="edit" tag="td">
<!--check if the current column is not selected for sorting-->
<$list filter="[<tempTableSort>getindex[sortIndex]match<currentColumn>]" variable=ignore
emptyMessage=<<edit_color>> >
 <<showCell_Locked>>
</$list>
</$reveal>

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/templates/body/.title: $:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/templates/body/default
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/templates/body/.text:
<$reveal type="nomatch" stateTitle=<<tempTableEdit>> stateIndex="mode" text="edit" tag="td">
<<showCell>>
</$reveal>
<$reveal type="match" stateTitle=<<tempTableEdit>> stateIndex="mode" text="edit" tag="td">
<!--check if the current column is not selected for sorting-->
<$list filter="[<tempTableSort>getindex[sortIndex]match<currentColumn>]" variable=ignore
emptyMessage=<<editCell>> >
 <<showCell_Locked>>
</$list>
</$reveal>

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/templates/body/.text:
<$reveal type="nomatch" stateTitle=<> stateIndex="mode" text="edit" tag="td"> <$list filter="[titletags[]]"> <$set name="transclusion" value=<>> <$macrocall $name="tag-pill-body" tag=<> icon={{!!icon}} colour={{!!color}} palette={{$:/palette}} element-tag="""$button""" element-attributes="""popup=<> dragFilter='[all[current]tagging[]]' tag='span'"""/> <$reveal state=<> style="position:absolute; z-index:9999;" type="popup" position="below" animate="yes" class="tc-drop-down"> <$set name="tv-show-missing-links" value="yes"> <$transclude tiddler="$:/core/ui/ListItemTemplate"/> <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/TagDropdown]!has[draft.of]]" variable="listItem"> <$transclude tiddler=<>/>
<$macrocall $name="list-tagged-draggable" tag=<>/> <$reveal type="match" stateTitle=<> stateIndex="mode" text="edit" tag="td"> <$list filter="[getindex[sortIndex]match]" variable=ignore emptyMessage=<> > <>

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/templates/body/.text: \define rowStyle() color:<>; background-color:<>; <$checkbox tiddler=<> tag="Done" checkactions="""<$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index=<> $value=<> /><$action-setfield $tiddler=<> status="complete"/>""" uncheckactions="""<$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index=<> /><$action-setfield $tiddler=<> status="rework"/>""" />

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/templates/body/.text:
<$reveal type="nomatch" state=<<tempPathExpand>> text="show" tag="td">
  <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink">
    <$action-setfield $tiddler=<<tempTableExpand>> $index=<<currentRecord>> $value="show" />
    {{$:/core/images/right-arrow}}
  </$button>
</$reveal>
<$reveal type="match" state=<<tempPathExpand>> text="show" tag="td">
  <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink">
    <$action-setfield $tiddler=<<tempTableExpand>> $index=<<currentRecord>>/>
    {{$:/core/images/down-arrow}}
  </$button>
</$reveal>

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/templates/body/.text: \define subtiddler-pattern() (^$(currentTiddler)$\s*/|^$(currentTiddler)$\s*:) <$text text={{{ [all[current]links[]matchthen[link]] [all[current]backlinks[]matchthen[backlink]] [all[current]tagging[]matchthen[tagging]] [regexpthen[subtiddler]] ~[search:textthen[backtransclusion]else[transclusion]] }}} />

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/templates/foote.title: $:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/templates/footer/default
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/templates/foote.text:
<$vars idx={{{ [<currentColumn>addsuffix[/]addsuffix<footerRow>] }}}>
<$set name=getFieldOrIndex filter="[<fieldOrIndex>]-index" value="get" emptyValue="getindex">
<$reveal type="nomatch" stateTitle=<<tempTableEdit>> stateIndex="mode" text="edit" tag="td">
<$transclude tiddler=<<tempTableFooter>> index=<<idx>> mode="inline" />
</$reveal>
<$reveal type="match" stateTitle=<<tempTableEdit>> stateIndex="mode" text="edit" tag="td">
<$edit-text tiddler=<<tempTableFooter>> index=<<idx>> tag="input" class="shiraz-dtable-textbox"/>
</$reveal>
</$set>
</$vars>

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/templates/heade.title: $:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/templates/header/default
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/templates/heade.text: <$reveal type="nomatch" stateTitle=<> stateIndex="sortIndex" text=<> tag="th"> <$button setTitle=<> setIndex="sortIndex" setTo=<> class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink" > <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index="hasnegate" $value="false"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index="negate" $value=""/> <$text text=<>/> <$reveal type="match" stateTitle=<> stateIndex="sortIndex" text=<> tag="th"> <$list filter="[getindex[hasnegate]match[false]]" variable=ignore> <$button setTitle=<> setIndex="hasnegate" setTo="true" class="tbl-sort-svg tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink" > <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index="negate" $value="!"/> <$text text=<>/> {{$:/core/images/down-arrow}} <$list filter="[getindex[hasnegate]match[true]]" variable=ignore> <$button setTitle=<> setIndex="hasnegate" setTo="false" class="tbl-sort-svg tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink" > <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index="negate" $value=""/> <$text text=<>/> {{$:/core/images/up-arrow}}

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/templates/heade.title: $:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/templates/header/tbl-checkbox
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/templates/heade.text:
\define rowStyle() color:<<colour foreground>>; background-color:<<colour table-header-background>>;

\define chk-checkactions()
<$list filter="[subfilter<inputFilter>]" variable="currentRecord">
<$action-listops $tiddler=<<currentRecord>> $tags="+[append[Done]]" />
<$action-setfield $tiddler=<<currentRecord>> status="complete"/>
<$action-setfield $tiddler=<<tempTableStyle>> $index=<<currentRecord>> $value=<<rowStyle>> />
</$list>
\end
\define chk-uncheckactions()
<$list filter="[subfilter<inputFilter>]" variable="currentRecord">
<$action-listops $tiddler=<<currentRecord>> $tags="+[remove[Done]]" />
<$action-setfield $tiddler=<<currentRecord>> status="rework"/>
<$action-setfield $tiddler=<<tempTableStyle>> $index=<<currentRecord>> />
</$list>
\end

<th style="width:28px;min-width:28px;">
<$checkbox checkactions=<<chk-checkactions>> uncheckactions=<<chk-uncheckactions>> />
</th>

<!-- old style for checked row
"color:#155724;background-color:#d4edda;"
-->

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/ui/Buttons/Swit.title: $:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/ui/Buttons/SwitchPalette
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/ui/Buttons/Swit.caption: {{$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/images/palette-switch}} {{$:/language/Buttons/Shiraz/Caption}}
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/ui/Buttons/Swit.text: \whitespace trim <$vars darkPalette ={{$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/ui/Buttons/SwitchPalette!!dark-palette}} lightPalette={{$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/ui/Buttons/SwitchPalette!!light-palette}} > <$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Shiraz/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Shiraz/Caption}} class=<> > <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> {{$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/images/palette-switch}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> switch palettes <$reveal type="match" state="$:/palette" text=<> > <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/palette" text=<> /> <$reveal type="nomatch" state="$:/palette" text=<> > <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/palette" text=<> >

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/ui/ControlPanel.title: $:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/ui/ControlPanel/Settings
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/ui/ControlPanel.caption: Shiraz
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/ui/ControlPanel.text:
These settings let you customise the behaviour of Shiraz plugin.

---

;Show Shiraz setting in more sidebar
:<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/ui/ControlPanel/Settings" tag="$:/tags/MoreSideBar"> Show setting in more sidebar</$checkbox>

;Options
:<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/styles/multicols/storyriver" tag="$:/tags/Stylesheet"> Multicolumn story river</$checkbox>
:<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/styles/ui/colorify-buttons" tag="$:/tags/Stylesheet"> Colorful UI buttons</$checkbox>
:<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/styles/ui/view-toolbar-button-visibility" tag="$:/tags/Stylesheet"> Tiddler visibility on mouse hover</$checkbox>
:<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/styles/ui/edit-toolbar-buttons" tag="$:/tags/Stylesheet"> Traffic lights for edit toolbar buttons</$checkbox>
:<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/styles/colorful-sidebar-tab" tag="$:/tags/Stylesheet"> Colorify sidebar tabs</$checkbox>

;Set dark and light palettes
{{$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/ui/set-dark-light-palette}}

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/ui/set-dark-lig.title: $:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/ui/set-dark-light-palette
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/ui/set-dark-lig.text:
\define switchpaletteTid() $:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/ui/Buttons/SwitchPalette \define selectPelette(title, default, tiddler, field) <$select tiddler=<<__tiddler__>> field=<<__field__>> default=""> <$list filter="[all[tiddlers+shadows]tag[$:/tags/Palette]]" > \end
<$macrocall $name=selectPelette title="Dark palette" filter=<> default="$:/palettes/SolarizedDark" field="dark-palette" tiddler=<> />
<$macrocall $name=selectPelette title="Light palette" filter=<> default="$:/palettes/Vanilla" field="light-palette" tiddler=<> /> <$button> {{$:/core/images/erase}} <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $field=dark-palette $value={{!!dark-palette}} /> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $field=light-palette $value={{!!light-palette}} /> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/palette" $field=text $value={{!!light-palette}} />
